subject: ORDER #SSN2185
description_text:
I checked baseplate but i dont need it can we modify order please and refund baseplate 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Refund comfirmation for base plate ? Sent from my iPhone
Hi Julien Bleau,  We have refunded you the price difference of the base plate, please check.
On my end , it does not appear yet i will wait Sent from my iPhone
What is shipping delay looking like ? Sent from my iPhone
Is there supposed to be a dc input cable in the package ? Because there is none i just received it Sent from my iPhone

Hi Julien Bleau,    Please take a photo of the goods you received and send it to us. We will have our warehouse staff confirm the contents, and if anything is missing, we will resend it to you. Please do not worry.
